update sunmnet_user_info
department_no = #{departmentNo,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
user_name = #{userName,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
user_nickname = #{userNickname,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
user_mobile = #{userMobile,jdbcType=VARCHAR},

mapper.insert:
insert into sunmnet_user_info (user_no, user_name, user_nickname, user_mobile, department_no, user_mail, user_status, user_password, relation_type,relation_no, create_time, last_modify_time ) values
(#{item.userNo},#{item.userName},#{item.userNickname},#{item.userMobile},#{item.departmentNo}, #{item.userMail},#{item.userStatus},#{item.userPassword},#{item.relationType},#{item.relationNo}, #{item.createTime},#{item.lastModifyTime} )
ON DUPLICATE KEY UPDATE user_name = VALUES(user_name), user_mobile = VALUES(user_mobile), user_mail = VALUES(user_mail), department_no = VALUES(department_no), last_modify_time = VALUES(last_modify_time), user_mail = VALUES(user_mail), user_mobile = VALUES(user_mobile)
